page.title: 17TRANSPORT, ALLET/CALLESTICK.
page.content: Most country people now consider cars a necessity; in Callestick the baker's and butcher's vans used to call frequently; now people drive to shops in Truro & only the milkman delivers. A private bus company operates a well- used service between Goonhavern and Truro on Wednesday, market-day,outward at 9.15am. and 1.45pm., returning from Truro at 1.0pm., 3.15pm. and 5.30pm. Children travel 3 miles to and from Goonhavern primary school by school bus from Callestick;then to Tretherras Comprehensive School,Newquay, 10 miles away, by bus from Perran Church 1 mile from Callestick. Truro/Perranporth/Newquay public bus service, Monday to Saturday, passes through Allet & \ mile from Callestick approximately every 2 hours.Bus travel is popular with elderly people. Few bicycles are seen in this hilly area.
